background_gradient.label: Background gradient
background_gradient.info: Background gradient replaces background where possible.

card_media_object_fit.label: Media fit
card_media_object_fit.info: This effects only if you choose a fixed aspect ratio.

product_card_media_hover.label: Show secondary media on hover
product_card_media_hover.info: When enabled, secondary product media will be displayed on product card hover.

product_card_media_object_fit.label: Media fit
product_card_media_object_fit.info: This effects only if you choose a fixed aspect ratio.

show_product_card_badges_sold.label: Show product card sold out badges

product_card_enable_quick_add_to_cart_bu.label: Enable quick add to cart drawer for multi variant products

product_card_enable_single_add_to_cart_b.label: Enable quick add to cart button for single variant products

variants_priority_list.label: Variants priority list
variants_priority_list.info: List of variant names in order of priority. If a variant is not found in the list, it will be displayed in the order it was created.

option_1.label: Country name, currency code and symbol

product_swatches_on_card.label: Enable product swatches
product_swatches_on_card.info: When enabled, product swatches will be displayed on product cards.

input_border_radius.label: Input shape
input_border_radius.info: This setting affects the input fields' corners.

arrow_type.label: Arrow type
arrow_type.info: This setting specify the arrow type.

swatches_option.label: Swatches option name
swatches_option.info: The option name, which will hold the swatch colors. e.g.: Color,Material,etc...

sizes_option.label: Sizes option
sizes_option.info: Product's variant option name for size. example: `Size`.

enable_shipping_notification.label: Enable shipping notification
enable_shipping_notification.info: Show a free shipping notification based on cart price.

shipping_notification_threshold.label: Threshold cart price
shipping_notification_threshold.info: Minimum price value for free delivery. Defaults to '0' (always free shipping), if enabled and the field is left blank.

cart_terms.label: Terms checkbox text
cart_terms.info: Shows checkbox to accept terms and conditions, before proceed to checkout. More info [here](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/checkout-settings/refund-privacy-tos).

enable_dynamic_checkout.label: Show dynamic checkout buttons
enable_dynamic_checkout.info: Please be aware that third-party apps could disable these buttons. Read more [here](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/dynamic-checkout/compatibility).

enable_cart_upsell.label: Enable upsell products
enable_cart_upsell.info: Products are displayed based on the first cart product and Shopify Recommendations API and Search & Discovery app. Read more [here](https://help.shopify.com/en//manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/product-recommendations)

search_suggestions.label: Search suggestions
search_suggestions.info: Present search suggestions with the created navigation element.

icons_corner_shape.label: Icon corner shape
icons_corner_shape.info: Only for icons with corner option.

timezone.label: Timezone (GMT)
timezone.info: Select the store's timezone for the countdown timers.

image_optimization.label: Image optimization
image_optimization.info: Optimized option will improve performance and reduce bandwidth usage of your store. Best detailed option will keep the original image quality.

disable_animations_on_mobile.label: Disable animations on mobile
disable_animations_on_mobile.info: Disable animations on mobile to support older devices with less accurate rendering of content.

settings.info: These settings are common for all sections.

for__header_item.info: Positioned in main navigation or utilities, depending on selected layout.

dot_position.info: Dot appears on image selected from section settings. Visible on desktop only.

grid_layout.info: The grid layout is used to divide the section into columns and rows.

media_mobile.info: If mobile media is set, it will be used on mobile devices instead of the main media.

for__form.info: Visible only for Choice type fields.

for__feed.info: Products are customizable through the Search & Discovery app. [Learn more.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/product-recommendations)

transparent_header.info: It is recommended to ensure that the first sections of both the home page and the collection page have good contrast with the transparent header.

truncate.label: Text truncate line limit
truncate.info: Text truncate to the specified number of lines. If you set 0, the text will not be truncated.

link_label.label: Link label
link_label.info: Leave empty to hide the link

style.label: Button style
style.info: Primary button style on theme settings is used when default is selected.

button_label.label: Button label
button_label.info: Leave empty to hide the button

button_label_1.label: First button label
button_label_1.info: Leave empty to hide the button

button_label_2.label: Second button label
button_label_2.info: Leave empty to hide the button

button_style.label: Button style
button_style.info: Primary button style on theme settings is used when default is selected.

for__mobile.label: Mobile image
for__mobile.info: If mobile image is set, it will be used on mobile devices instead of the main image.

show_controls.label: Show video controls on product media

video_external.label: External video
video_external.info: Overwrites image and video. We recommend above video option for better performance, external videos can cause performance issues.

icon.label: Icon
icon.info: Leave blank to hide the icon. You can find the list of available icons [here](https://www.digifist.com/en/help-center/documentation/theme/release/icons).

for__product_variant.label: Metafield for product variant
for__product_variant.info: Enter related metafield namespace and key to show variant metafield. eg: 'theme.variant_metafield'

enable_infinity_scroll.label: Enable infinity scroll
enable_infinity_scroll.info: This feature is available only for the load more pagination style. When enabled, the load more button will be replaced with infinity scroll.

height.label: Height
height.info: If set to auto, the height will be determined by the content.

autoplay.label: Autoplay
autoplay.info: If set to 0, autoplay is stopped.

autoplay_speed.label: Autoplay speed
autoplay_speed.info: If set to 0, autoplay is stopped.

autoplay_interval.label: Autoplay interval
autoplay_interval.info: If set to 0, autoplay is disabled.

slides_per_view.label: Slides per view
slides_per_view.info: Number of slides per view. Set to 1 for single slide view.

for__blocks.label: Block bottom spacing
for__blocks.info: Set the bottom spacing for the blocks.

for__pdp_block.label: Grid spacing unit for product content
for__pdp_block.info: Each block has own spacing settings also.

section_height.label: Section height
section_height.info: Set the height of the section. Desktop only.

button_style.label: Button style
button_style.info: Primary button style on theme settings is used when default is selected.

label_description.label: Label description
label_description.info: Visible only for Choice type fields.

binding.label: Binding
binding.info: The binding is used to connect the form field with Shopify's some fundamental customer fields. The binding is used for only Normal type fields.

required.label: Required field
required.info: If enabled, the field must be filled out before submitting the form.

checked.label: Checked field
checked.info: If enabled and the field has multiple or single options, the first option will automatically be set as selected.

pattern.label: Pattern
pattern.info: Regular expression pattern for validation. Advanced usage only.

button_label.label: Button label
button_label.info: Leave empty to hide the button

button_style.label: Button style
button_style.info: Primary button style on theme settings is used when default is selected.

button_label.label: Button label
button_label.info: Leave empty to hide the button

button_style.label: Button style
button_style.info: Primary button style on theme settings is used when default is selected.

layout.label: Layout
layout.info: Alignment of heading, button and arrows.

video_desktop_external.placeholder: Use a YouTube or Vimeo URL
video_desktop_external.label: External video
video_desktop_external.info: Overwrites image and video. We recommend above video option for better performance, external videos can cause performance issues.

image_placeholder.label: Image placeholder
image_placeholder.info: This image will be displayed instead of the main image when the main image is not displaying due to metafield definitions.

video_mobile_external.placeholder: Use a YouTube or Vimeo URL
video_mobile_external.label: External video
video_mobile_external.info: Overwrites image and video. We recommend above video option for better performance, external videos can cause performance issues.

video_mobile_compact.label: Compact video
video_mobile_compact.info: Video will be displayed in a compact format on mobile.

placeholder_svg_code.label: SVG code for placeholder
placeholder_svg_code.info: Paste your SVG code here and it will be used as a placeholder image.

media_gallery_info.label: Media gallery info
media_gallery_info.info: This info will be displayed on the media gallery.

show_design_helper.label: Show theme design helper
show_design_helper.info: It will show a light background behind blocks to help you design. It will not be visible to your customers.

timer_end_message.label: Timer end message
timer_end_message.info: This message will be displayed when the timer ends.

enable_country_selector.label: Enable country selector
enable_country_selector.info: To add a country/region, go to your [market settings.](/admin/settings/markets)

enable_language_selector.label: Enable language selector
enable_language_selector.info: To add a language, go to your [language settings.](/admin/settings/languages)

metaobject_type.label: Related metaobject type
metaobject_type.info: Enter your created metaobject type to show fields from it.

timer_end_message.label: Timer end message
timer_end_message.info: This message will be displayed when the timer ends.

country_drawer_header.label: Enable in announcement bar
country_drawer_header.info: If country drawer is activated, the current block will only appear on the desktop.

drawer_layer.label: Enable navigation drawer layer
drawer_layer.info: The show/hide feature is added to the third level menu elements in the navigation drawer

logo_nav_aligned_start.label: Logo and navigation aligned to start

transparent_logo.label: Logo for transparent header
transparent_logo.info: Shows only when logo is selected.

logo_width.label: Max desktop width
logo_width.info: Works only when an image or svg is selected.

logo_width_mobile.label: Max mobile width
logo_width_mobile.info: Works only when an image or svg is selected.

nav_items_border.label: Borders for navigation elements
nav_items_border.info: Allows you to add borders to the inward-facing edges of the first and last element.

for__mobile.label: Mobile menu
for__mobile.info: If you want to use a different menu for mobile, you can create a new menu and select it here.

utils_link_display.label: Utilities link display
utils_link_display.info: You can choose how the utilities will be displayed on desktop

country_drawer_header.label: Enable in header
country_drawer_header.info: Positioned in main navigation or utilities, depending on selected layout.

card_aspect_ratio.label: Card aspect ratio
card_aspect_ratio.info: You can customize the aspect ratio of the card. Desktop only.

menu_link_title.label: Menu link title
menu_link_title.info: Enter a tier 1 link title to tie the image to its parent element.

paragraph.content: You should activate quick add to cart button on product cards with this setting: Theme Settings > Product cards > Add to cart > Show quick add to cart button.

enable_filters.label: Enable filters
enable_filters.info: Enable filters to filter products by price, color, size, etc.

enable_sorting.label: Enable sorting
enable_sorting.info: Enable sorting to sort products by price, name, etc.

sidebar_navigation.label: Navigation
sidebar_navigation.info: Displayed as a carousel on mobile

products_per_page.label: Products per page
products_per_page.info: The number of products will automatically adjust based on the text card size to keep layout consistency.

products_per_row_ui.label: Enable products per row UI
products_per_row_ui.info: Desktop only. When enabled users will be able to switch between 3 or 4 products per row.

section_height.info: If you set 'Auto' the height will be calculated based on the content.

section_height_mobile.info: You can set mobile image with metafield in the collection.

position.label: Position
position.info: If position number is higher than products per page number, products per page number will be used

width.label: Width
width.info: Applies to desktop and tablet sizes and will completely cover the entire row in mobile view.

column_factor.info: Column factor will be adjusted based on product cards per row setting to keep layout consistency.

adaptive_height.label: Adaptive height
adaptive_height.info: If enabled, the card height will be adjusted based on the product cards.

collections_per_page.label: Collections per page
collections_per_page.info: This setting is used only when all collections are shown.

enable_filters.label: Enable filters
enable_filters.info: Enable filters to filter products by price, color, size, etc.

enable_sorting.label: Enable sorting
enable_sorting.info: Enable sorting to sort products by price, name, etc.

show_page_title.label: Show page title
show_page_title.info: Uncheck only if the page content has `H1` heading

api_key.label: Google maps API key
api_key.info: Embeds a map with Google Maps. You can learn how to set up google api keys [here](https://support.google.com/googleapi/answer/6158862?hl=en).

address.label: Address
address.info: Uses the shop address by default. Override it using this format: street address, city country / state

product_media_with_thumbs.label: Gallery thumbnails
product_media_with_thumbs.info: On mobile, thumbnails are horizontal and below the main image.

adaptive_ratio_and_auto_height.label: Adaptive ratio and auto height
adaptive_ratio_and_auto_height.info: If gallery area is so big in slider layout, you can use adaptive ratio to make it smaller.

metafield_as_seen_on.label: Metafield for 'As seen on'
metafield_as_seen_on.info: Enter related metafield namespace and key to show images as 'As seen on'. eg: 'theme.as_seen_on'

enable_media_controls.label: Video controls
enable_media_controls.info: Works only if the video is not external YouTube or Vimeo

enable_actions_bar.label: Enable sticky add to cart bar

media_grid_size.label: Product gallery width
media_grid_size.info: Only desktop. Product gallery is automatically optimized for mobile.

media_grid_position.label: Product gallery position
media_grid_position.info: Only desktop. Product gallery is automatically optimized for mobile.

grid_content_spacing.label: Content grid spacing
grid_content_spacing.info: Each block has its own spacing options to overwrite this.

link_to_resource.label: Link to products
link_to_resource.info: Provide links to filter collection results by type and vendor.

text_before_link.label: Text before link
text_before_link.info: Displays the text before type and vendor links

show_block_content.label: Show block content after variant specific content

heading.info: This heading overwrites the default heading of the block.

heading_secondary.label: Secondary animated text
heading_secondary.info: This is a secondary text displays animated and only works for 'text only' option.

show_price_extra_info.label: Show tax status and shipping policy link

title.label: Title
title.info: This field purpose is to display the correct name across section blocks.

show_variant_images.label: Show variant image for swatches
show_variant_images.info: This options works with button display type. If variant image is not available, it shows the default buttons.

size_guide_page.label: Size guide content
size_guide_page.info: Displays the content of the page that needs to be created specifically for the size guide popup.

sizes_option.label: Size option label
sizes_option.info: This option is needed to identify where to display the size guide popup button. You can simply write uor  size variant option name. example: `Size`

show_dynamic_checkout.label: Show dynamic checkout buttons
show_dynamic_checkout.info: Using the payment methods available on your store, customers see their preferred option, like PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)

show_gift_card_recipient.label: Show recipient information form for gift cards
show_gift_card_recipient.info: Allows buyers to send gift cards on a scheduled date along with a personal message. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/add-gift-card-recipient-fields)

custom_liquid.label: Custom liquid
custom_liquid.info: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations.

notice_just_text.label: Don't show the quantity, show only the text

paragraph.content: Complementary products are customizable through the Search & Discovery app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/product-recommendations)

flip_mobile_positions.label: Flip top and bottom content positions on mobile

content_type.label: Content type
content_type.info: Complementary products are customizable through the Search & Discovery app. [Learn more.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/product-recommendations)

open_first_collapsible.label: Set first collapsible item opened
open_first_collapsible.info: It will only work if the first block type is set to 'collapsible'.

page.info: If page is selected, content setting will be ignored.

show_popup_on_customizer.label: Show age verification popup in customizer

show_blurred_backdrop.label: Display blurred backdrop for sensitive content

slider_height.label: Hero height
slider_height.info: Set the height of the hero to change the height of the slide.

slideshow_autoplay_interval.label: Slideshow autoplay interval
slideshow_autoplay_interval.info: If set to 0, autoplay will be disabled.

show_slideshow_navigation.label: Show slideshow navigation
show_slideshow_navigation.info: Slideshow navigation arrows will be displayed only on desktop.

show_slideshow_pagination.label: Show slideshow pagination
show_slideshow_pagination.info: Slideshow pagination will be displayed on desktop and mobile.

floating_bar.label: Floating Bar
floating_bar.info: This will activate floating bar when the marquee section is added end after the hero section.

video_external.placeholder: Use a YouTube or Vimeo URL
video_external.label: External video
video_external.info: Overwrites image and video. We recommend above video option for better performance, external videos can cause performance issues.

video_external_mobile.placeholder: Use a YouTube or Vimeo URL
video_external_mobile.label: External video
video_external_mobile.info: Overwrites image and video. We recommend above video option for better performance, external videos can cause performance issues.

enable_vertical_line.label: Enable vertical line
enable_vertical_line.info: Displays a vertical line below button. Visible only when content is horizontally centered.

section_height.label: Section height
section_height.info: If you set 'Auto' the height will be calculated based on the content.

section_height_mobile.label: Section height for mobile
section_height_mobile.info: If you set 'Auto' the height will be calculated based on the content.

collections_menu.label: Menu
collections_menu.info: Add a collection menu by including [navigation](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/menus-and-links/editing-menus), whose first level links names match any of your shop's collections.

video_external.info: Recommended aspect ratio is 16:9. Overwrites image and video. We recommend above video option for better performance, external videos can cause performance issues.

image_aspect_ratio.info: If you choose 'Auto', you should be sure that all images have the similar aspect ratios to keep consistency in section.

collection_counter.label: Collection product counter
collection_counter.info: It is a display of how many products are in your collection.

collection_product_count.label: Collection product count
collection_product_count.info: You can show the collection product count next to the collection heading.

layout.label: Layout
layout.info: You can choose to have the Carousel take up the page size or the entire screen.

heading.info: Connect dynamic source to get collection title automatically

banner_layout.label: Banner layout
banner_layout.info: Select the layout of the banner

full_width_banner_height.label: Banner height for desktop
full_width_banner_height.info: Set the desktop height of the banner to change the height of section.

full_width_banner_mobile_height.label: Banner height for mobile
full_width_banner_mobile_height.info: Set the mobile height of the banner to change the height of section.

full_width_banner_height.label: Banner height for desktop
full_width_banner_height.info: Set the desktop height of the banner to change the height of section.

full_width_banner_mobile_height.label: Banner height for mobile
full_width_banner_mobile_height.info: Set the mobile height of the banner to change the height of section.

max_products.label: Number of products for each group
max_products.info: Maximum number of products to display.

collection_of_products.label: Collection of products
collection_of_products.info: You should create a smart collection with all products and enter the collection handle here to use vendor option.

title.label: Title
title.info: If no title is provided, the collection or vendor name will be used.

collection.label: Collection
collection.info: Collection selection will overwrite product selection.

show_unavailable_products.label: Show unavailable products
show_unavailable_products.info: If enabled, products that are out of stock or unavailable will be displayed.

collection.label: Collection
collection.info: Products will be pulled from collection, overwrites products list.

max_products.label: Number of products
max_products.info: Maximum number of products to display.

show_unavailable_products.label: Show unavailable products
show_unavailable_products.info: If enabled, products that are out of stock or unavailable will be displayed.

tile_aspect_ratio.label: Tile aspect ratio
tile_aspect_ratio.info: You can set the aspect ratio of the tile, it is especially useful for images and videos.

media_aspect_ratio.label: Media aspect ratio
media_aspect_ratio.info: You can set the aspect ratio of slideshow media.

source_of_slideshow.label: Source of slideshow
source_of_slideshow.info: If you define a metaobject as a source, the slideshow will be populated with the media from the metaobject. You can find setup instructions on [here](https://www.digifist.com/en/help-center/documentation/theme/release/multitile).

block_size.label: First block size
block_size.info: Second one will be set automatically.

aspect_ratio.info: Useful for images and videos. Auto option is recommended for long text.

show_other_elements_with_product.label: Show other elements with product on mobile

marquee_duration_rate.label: Animation speed
marquee_duration_rate.info: The higher the number, the slower the animation.

button_label.label: Button label
button_label.info: If left empty, the button will not be displayed.

layout.label: Layout
layout.info: When the carousel option is selected, the image will not appear.

api_key.label: Google maps API key
api_key.info: You should create a Google maps API key and add it here to display the map. [Learn more](https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/javascript/get-api-key)

section_height.label: Height desktop
section_height.info: Set the height of the section. Desktop only.

cards_height_auto.label: Set auto height
cards_height_auto.info: You can't use desktop height options when this checkbox is selected

store_pin_link.label: Custom directions Link
store_pin_link.info: If left blank, generated Google Map directions link will be used.

coordinate_title.label: Custom tooltip text
coordinate_title.info: If left blank, store name will be used.

store_latitude.label: Latitude
store_latitude.info: Enter the latitude coordinate. You can learn more about search by latitude [here](https://support.google.com/maps/answer/18539?hl=en&co=GENIE.Platform%3DDesktop).

store_longitude.label: Longitude
store_longitude.info: Enter the longitude coordinate. You can learn more about search by longitude [here](https://support.google.com/maps/answer/18539?hl=en&co=GENIE.Platform%3DDesktop).

reverse_positions.label: Reverse positions
reverse_positions.info: Reverse image and products carousel positions. It does not work when the full width banner layout is selected.

product.info: You can see the shop the look card after select the product.

title_font_size.label: Items title font size
title_font_size.info: The changes will only apply to desktop.

mobile_image.label: Mobile Image
mobile_image.info: The selected image will only appear in mobile view.

padding_top.label: Desktop padding top
padding_top.info: The changes will only apply to desktop.

padding_bottom.label: Desktop padding bottom
padding_bottom.info: The changes will only apply to desktop.

products_counter.label: Enable products counter
products_counter.info: Helps to show how many items are in the collection in a small title. If there are no products in the collection, this title will not appear.

social_links_in_new_tab.label: Open social media links in new tab

layout.label: Layout
layout.info: Small logo appears in utilities column. Large logo appears at the bottom above copyright text, takes up entire screen width. If no logo is selected, logo is not displayed.

logo_width.label: Max desktop width
logo_width.info: Works only when an image or svg is selected.

logo_width_mobile.label: Max mobile width
logo_width_mobile.info: Works only when an image or svg is selected.

enable_payment_icons.label: Show payment icons
enable_payment_icons.info: Show payment icons, based on the payment methods available.

custom_payment_types.label: Custom payment icons
custom_payment_types.info: Add custom payment icons if you can't find the one you need in the list above. Duplicated icons will be removed.

copyright.label: Copyright text
copyright.info: To display current year type in [year]

paragraph.content: To allow customers to follow your store on the Shop app from your storefront, Shop Pay must be enabled. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/follow-on-shop)

icons.label: Icons
icons.info: Icons will be displayed instead of text

enable_country_selector.label: Enable country selector
enable_country_selector.info: To add a country/region, go to your [market settings.](/admin/settings/markets)

enable_language_selector.label: Enable language selector
enable_language_selector.info: To add a language, go to your [language settings.](/admin/settings/languages)

logo_width.label: Max desktop width
logo_width.info: Works only when an image or svg is selected.

logo_width_mobile.label: Max mobile width
logo_width_mobile.info: Works only when an image or svg is selected.

content.label: Content
content.info: To display current year type in [year]

text.label: Text
text.info: To display current year type in [year]

header.info: To display payment icons, go to your [payment settings.](/admin/settings/payments)

custom_payment_types.label: Custom payment types
custom_payment_types.info: Add custom payment icons if you can't find the one you need in the list above. Duplicated icons will be removed.

page.label: Page
page.info: Outputs page content as topic body text. Overwrites topic content field.

custom_liquid.label: Liquid
custom_liquid.info: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations.

logo_card_image.label: Cover image
logo_card_image.info: PNG with transparent background is recommended for best results.

logo_card_svg_code.label: Logo card SVG code
logo_card_svg_code.info: Overwrites logo card image and defaults to logo SVG code

aspect_ratio.info: Sets the aspect ratio for the card when the media position is 'background', and for the media itself when the media position is 'top' or 'bottom'.
